articles.title: If kids can go to school at 7am, SC can start at 9am: Justice Lalit
articles.description: The Supreme Court benches assemble at 10.30am on weekdays to commence business of the day till 4pm with a lunch break for an hour between 1pm and 2pm | Latest News India

articles.title: Rs 85,000 cr money manager is betting that equities rout will end soon
articles.description: Indias NSE Nifty 50 Index has slipped nearly 14% from its all-time high touched in October as inflation, tightening monetary policy and persistent selling by foreigners weighed on sentiment. The insurer is using the rout to buy growth stocks at reasonable val…
articles.content:
Bajaj Allianz Life Insurance Co. is drawing down its cash pile to load up Indian stocks on a bet that the equity market rout will bottom out soon.

articles.title: Ivana Trump, first wife of Donald Trump, dies at 73
articles.description: Ivana Trump, the first wife of former U.S. President Donald Trump and the mother of his three oldest children, who helped her husband build some of his signature buildings including Trump Tower, has died at age 73.
